name: Media Search bot
description: When you going to send file on telegram channel/group this bot will save that in database, So you can search that easily in inline mode

input_channel_names.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

output_channel_names.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

session_name.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA
